definition: one of (sth)/one out of a multitude/one (third, quarter, percent etc)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to put to the torch (idiom)/to commit to the flames/to burn sth down deliberately
to dismiss sth with a laugh (idiom)/to laugh it off
to dismiss with a sigh (idiom); a hopeless case
to dismiss with a sigh (idiom); a hopeless case
to dismiss with a sigh (idiom); a hopeless case
to dismiss with a sigh (idiom); a hopeless case

sentences.english: It is one of the famous paintings in the ancient Eygptian history.
sentences.chinese: 这是古老的埃及史上最著名的油画之一。

sentences.english: However, satisfaction also appears to be influenced by psychologic factors.
sentences.chinese: 然而，满意程度似乎也是整个身体的影响因素之一。

sentences.english: Melon's skin is thin, only about one-third of thick watermelon rind.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的皮很薄，大约只有西瓜皮的三分之一厚。

sentences.english: It turns out Jialing is one of the oldest and largest motorcycle manufacturers in its home country.
sentences.chinese: 嘉陵是中国最古老也是最大的摩托车生产商之一。

sentences.english: Revolving pushing is one of the methods of pushing shot.
sentences.chinese: 旋转推铅是推铅球的方法之一。

sentences.english: Madame Defarge was one of the leading spirits of the Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 迪法热夫人是这场革命的主要人物之一。

sentences.english: And when finally I put it down, my mind was totally refreshed.
sentences.chinese: 最后放下书来时，我倦意全消，身心为之一爽。

sentences.english: This is one of many cultural chasms across the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 这只是横跨大西洋的诸多文化鸿沟之一。

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相对无害的替代办法之一是利用太阳鞣自我鞣洗剂。

sentences.english: The heart is one of first organs to form during organogenesis in the vertebrate.
sentences.chinese: 心脏是脊椎动物器官发生过程中最早形成的器官之一。

sentences.english: The arid valleys of the Minjiang River is the worst ecotope in West China.
sentences.chinese: 岷江干旱河谷是我国西部生态环境最恶劣的地区之一。

sentences.english: It surely ranks among the most valuable literary artifacts in America.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，它算得上美国最珍贵的文学遗产之一。

sentences.english: Gathering frequent flyer miles is one of the perks of OCS travel.
sentences.chinese: 积累飞行里程是商务旅行的额外补贴之一。

sentences.english: Visible at that time, contend for effect bookman , furniture of snap up fine wood also is one of vogue.
sentences.chinese: 可见当时，争效文人，争购细木家具也是时尚之一了。

sentences.english: We allow one percent for leakage.
sentences.chinese: 我们少算百分之一作为漏损。

sentences.english: He is one of the most talented and inventive drummers in modern music.
sentences.chinese: 他是现代音乐界最具天赋和创造力的鼓手之一。

definition: the four elements: earth, water, fire, and wind (Buddhism)/the four freedoms: speaking out freely, airing views fully, holding great debates, and writing big-character posters, 大鳴大放|大鸣大放[da4 ming2 da4 fang4], 大辯論|大辩论[da4 bian4 lun4], 大字報|大字报[da4 zi4 bao4] (PRC)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
